thread.title: Oscars: Annual Nominees Luncheon Class Photo Unveiled
thread.title_full: Oscars: Annual Nominees Luncheon Class Photo Unveiled

title: Oscars: Annual Nominees Luncheon Class Photo Unveiled
text:
Oscars: Annual Nominees Luncheon Class Photo Unveiled by THR Staff February 06, 2017, 3:46pm PST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 163 nominees attended the lunch held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Monday. 
One hundred sixty-three of the nominees for this year's Academy Awards attended the 36th annual Oscar Nominees Luncheon at the Beverly Hilton on Monday afternoon. 
The annual class photo was snapped at the event, hosted by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences' board of governors. Nominees on hand included everyone from La La Land 's Emma Stone and Lion 's Nicole Kidman to Fences star Denzel Washington and Hell or High Water 's Jeff Bridges. 
The 89th annual Academy Awards, hosted by Jimmy Kimmel, will air Feb. 26, live on ABC. 
View the class photo above. Main Image: Todd Wawrychuk / ÂŠA.M.P.A.S.
